Advanced Alchemy: Can create 4 consumable infused alchemical items of up to level 5 without a Crafting check during daily prep
Alchemical Crafting: Can use Crafting to create alchemical items
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Formula Book: Has a book that contains at least 8 alchemical formulas
Quick Alchemy: (1) Creates 1 versatile vial bomb or research item that lasts until the end of the turn, or uses versatile vials to create 1 alchemical item of up to level 1 that lasts until the start of the next turn
Versatile Vials: Can create 5 versatile vials during daily prep
Combat
Hit Points: 68 Armor Class: 22 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Alchemist: 16 (intelligence; expert); Fighter: 20 (strength; trained)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Bola (+12 1d6+3 B R20'; dexterity; expert); Light Mace (+12 1d4+3 B; strength; expert); Main-gauche (+12 1d4+3 P/S; strength; expert)

Alchemical Power: Can use Alchemist DC for infused item save DCs
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Save: Fortitude: +11 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +12 (dexterity; expert); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Notes
Validation Errors:
Advanced Concoction Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and basic concoction feature (currently 1)
Alchemical Power Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 12, alchemist dedication feature (currently 1) and crafting rank (currently 3) >= 3
Class Feats Allocation: 5 available vs. 6 allocated
Voluminous Vials Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6, alchemist dedication feature (currently 1) and crafting rank (currently 3) >= 2
